ygData.subject: Re: tinkering skill
ygData.msgSnippet: Everything else trivialized at 102, so that s when I started making aqualungs.  Those trivialize out at 148, but I attempted 6 rebreathers at skill 114, and
ygData.messageBody:
Everything else trivialized at 102, so that's when I
started making aqualungs. Those trivialize out at
148, but I attempted 6 rebreathers at skill 114, and
make 2 successfully. I'm currently at skill 116, and
I will attempt no more rebreathers unless I have
guaranteed orders due to their expensive nature.

I just suffered a string of bad luck while making my
last batch of lungs. I succeeded well enough, about
my average (17 out of 27), but I only gained one skill
point increase. I had intended to gain about 6 or 7
points like I normally do when I try a batch of 24,
and then make a few rebreather attempts, but due to
the poor results with skill raises, I didn't bother
with them.

I wish you luck!

Gazamel
